title: time.Format(time.Kitchen) returns 0:00PM when it should return 12:00PM
body:
by **gary.capell**: 
&time.Time{Hour:12}.Format(time.Kitchen) returns "0:00PM", I believe it
should return "12:00PM"

Which revision are you using?  $ hg identify
95d2ce135523 (release-branch.r57) release.r57.1/release
